edu.stanford.math.plex

Class SimplexFaceIterator

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.stanford.math.plex.SimplexFaceIterator

  • public class SimplexFaceIterator
extends java.lang.Object
    The SimplexFaceIterator class.

    A SimplexFaceIterator instance makes an iterator that returns all of the faces of a Simplex (specified via a Simplex or a SimplexHandle) in a given dimension range. It also keeps track of the sign of the last one returned, so that this can be used to compute the boundary of a simplex.

    Version:
    $Id$

      • SimplexFaceIterator

        public SimplexFaceIterator(Simplex s,
                   int dimension)
        Construct a new iterator for the faces specified dimension.

        Parameters:
        s - Simplex whose faces are of interest.
        dimension - Dimension of the faces we care about (often dimension of the simplex - 1).
